// TODO: The following should eventually be sourced and generated
//       from the main tests within the PDSL
const _ref = require("pdsl/helpers");

const assert = require("assert");

assert.strictEqual(_ref.val(_ref.not(_ref.or(_ref.val(null), _ref.val(undefined))))(1), true);
assert.strictEqual(_ref.val(_ref.obj("name"))({
  name: "foo"
}), true);
assert.strictEqual(_ref.val(true)(true), true);
assert.strictEqual(_ref.val(_ref.obj(_ref.entry("name", _ref.pred(a => a.length > 10))))({
  name: "12345678901"
}), true);
assert.strictEqual(_ref.val(_ref.extant)(1), true);
assert.strictEqual(_ref.val(_ref.extant)(null), false);
assert.strictEqual(_ref.val(_ref.and(_ref.arrTypeMatch(_ref.prim(Number)), _ref.arrLen(5)))([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]), true);
assert.strictEqual(_ref.val(_ref.regx(_ref.Email))("email@example.com"), true);
